name: Heartbroken
overview: Heartbroken is 2D side scrolling action game. An evil warlock kidnapped Princess Mertha and created an army of fearsome creatures. The player must free the his lovely princess to prove his loyalty to the King. He can use magic fireballs. Gameplay is pretty typical - the player walks on different locations, searches book (necessary to create new spells) and fights monsters created by an evil warlock.
